posts.title: GLP-1 Pills: The Wegovy Pill Revolution for Weight Loss
posts.excerpt: Oral Wegovy is the first FDA-approved GLP-1 pill for weight loss, achieving 14-16.6% weight loss. Learn about $149-$299 pricing, pill vs injection comparison, eligibility criteria, side effects, and how to track your progress.

posts.title: Coffee & Blood Sugar: What 3 Cups Really Does
posts.excerpt: Discover the coffee paradox: caffeine can spike blood sugar 8-10% short-term, yet 3-4 cups daily reduces diabetes risk by 25%. Learn timing, genetics, and how to optimize your coffee habit.

posts.title: Stress & Cortisol: The Hidden Blood Sugar Saboteur Nobody Talks About
posts.excerpt: Chronic stress can raise blood sugar by 20-50 mg/dL and increase diabetes risk by 45%. Learn how cortisol triggers glucose spikes, why the dawn phenomenon happens, and 5 evidence-based techniques (MBSR, 4-7-8 breathing, yoga) that lower HbA1c as effectively as metformin.

posts.title: How Ayurveda Treats Type 2 Diabetes: Ancient Wisdom Meets Modern Science
posts.excerpt: Evidence-based guide to Ayurvedic diabetes treatment: 8 scientifically validated herbs (Gymnema, fenugreek, turmeric), dosha-based diet modifications, yoga practices, and Panchakarma detoxification. Backed by 2024-2025 clinical research.

posts.title: Diabetes Statistics 2025: 589 Million Adults Affected Globally
posts.excerpt: Complete 2025 diabetes data from IDF, ICMR, CDC: 589M global, 101M India, 38M USA. 252M undiagnosed (43%). $1 trillion healthcare costs. 3.4M deaths annually. Projections to 853M by 2050.

posts.title: Future of Diabetes Treatment: Cures on the Horizon
posts.excerpt: 2024 breakthrough: First stem cell reversal achieved - woman insulin-free with 98% TIR. Vertex VX-880 Phase 3 shows 10/12 patients insulin-independent. CRISPR beta cells working without immunosuppression. Is a cure finally coming?

posts.title: Vascular Complications of Diabetes: Stroke, PAD & Diabetic Foot Care
posts.excerpt: Diabetes increases stroke risk 2-4x and PAD 5x. Learn about peripheral arterial disease, diabetic foot ulcers (6.3% global prevalence), and how 80% of amputations are preventable with proper care.

posts.title: Diabetes Emergencies: When High Blood Sugar Becomes Life-Threatening
posts.excerpt: HHS has 15-20% mortality (10x higher than DKA). Learn warning signs, when to call 911, DKA vs HHS differences, and prevention based on 2024 ADA consensus report. 32% of HHS patients had no prior diabetes diagnosis.

posts.title: Diabetes Diagnosis: Complete Testing Guide

posts.title: Can You Stop Diabetes Medication? The Truth About Lifelong Treatment
